patterns: Tell me who is the GOAT of football.
responses:
"GOAT" is often used to refer to the greatest player of all time. This is a subjective term and can vary based on personal opinions and eras.
According to the most recent assessments, Lionel Messi is a bright name for the title of GOAT of fooball because of what he has been able to accomplish and achieve in his career. 
Pelé, Diego Maradona and Cristiano Ronaldo are often debated as potential contenders for the title of the "GOAT" in football.
